content.question: The industrialization and mechanization of agriculture in the United States during the past 70 years have resulted in

choices.label: a decrease in the number of farms and an increase in the size of farms
an increase in the number of farms and a decrease in the size of farm fields
an increase in the diversity of crops and animals grown on individual farms
an increase in the economic viability of small towns in the agricultural regions
a decrease in the tonnage of pesticides and herbicides used on cropland

content.answer: a decrease in the number of farms and an increase in the size of farms

unit.text: 5: Agriculture and Rural Land-Use Patterns and Processes
